title: Ticket #7455: Allow admin to specify token request limits
description:
For #7262, we added a param knob SEC_IMPERSONATION_TOKEN_LIMITS that restricted the authorizations available to impersonation tokens issued by the schedd.

It's a solid idea in general: allow the admin to control what kind of tokens may be issued. We should do the same for the "normal" token request mechanism. In fact, when adding token request support to the HTCondor-CE collector, it's precisely a piece of functionality we want.
